data.actual_result: it'll also say "Unmarked the channel as NSFW" with every category you create, even though you can't set categories as NSFW in the first place
data.expected_result: it should only say "Set the name to x"
data.short_description: Every channel category creation entry in the audit log will say "Unmarked the channel as NSFW"
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a category - Go to Server Settings -> Audit Log - Click on the category audit log entry you just created
